question.text: Read the following statements about adrenal hormones. Select the correct one.

options.text: Aldosterone stimulates the reabsorption of Ca<sup>2+</sup> and water from the renal tubules.
Glucocorticoids promote cellular uptake and utilisation of amino acids.
Androgens helps in the maintenance of body fluid volume and osmotic pressure only.

solution.text: Aldosterone stimulates the reabsorption of <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="bold">N</mi><mi mathvariant="bold">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> and water from renal tubules. Glucocorticoids inhibit cellular uptake and utilisation of amino acids. Aldosterone helps in the maintenance of body fluid volume, electrolytes, osmotic pressure and blood pressure.
